# Project Overview
This repository is for FamilyRecipes, a project for managing and sharing family recipes.

# Tech Stack
Please determine the appropriate tech stack based on the project structure and files in the repository.

# Coding Guidelines
- Follow consistent coding style and formatting throughout the codebase
- Use clear, descriptive variable and function names
- Add comments to explain complex logic or non-obvious decisions
- Keep functions focused and modular

# Testing Instructions
- Create appropriate tests for new features and bug fixes
- Ensure all tests pass before submitting changes
- Follow existing test patterns and conventions in the repository

# Documentation
- Update README.md when adding new features or changing functionality
- Document setup and installation steps clearly
- Provide examples for complex features or APIs

# Structure & Resources
- Maintain a clean and organized file structure
- Follow existing patterns and conventions in the repository
- See README.md for additional guidance on contributing
